description.overview: Spirit represents your sense of meaning, spiritual connection, inner knowing, and creative flow.
description.detailed: This group combines four spiritual dimensions: Purpose (life direction and meaning), Connection (spiritual belonging and unity), Intuition (psychic awareness and inner guidance), and Creativity (creative flow and self-expression). Together they show your overall spiritual and creative state. High scores mean you feel aligned with purpose, spiritually connected, intuitively clear, and creatively flowing. Low scores suggest feeling lost, isolated, cut off from intuition, or creatively blocked.

quiet.challenging: Meaning feels distant - this is part of the spiritual journey
quiet.mixed: Spiritual energy is subtle - quiet exploration happening
quiet.harmonious: Peaceful spiritual alignment - stillness holds meaning

mild.challenging: Direction is unclear - be gentle in the searching
mild.mixed: Gentle spiritual exploration - both seeking and finding
mild.harmonious: Soft connection to purpose - alignment comes naturally

moderate.challenging: Spiritual blocks present - work through questions with patience
moderate.mixed: Active spiritual process - seeking and discovering simultaneously
moderate.harmonious: Strong alignment with purpose and creativity - trust the flow

high.challenging: Deep spiritual questions arising - major meaning-making happening
high.mixed: Intense transformation - both breakdown and breakthrough
high.harmonious: Profound connection to purpose and creativity - major alignment

extreme.challenging: Spiritual crisis or dark night - major meaning reconstruction
extreme.mixed: Massive spiritual upheaval - chaos and revelation together
extreme.harmonious: Complete spiritual alignment - purpose, intuition, creativity all flowing
